senses.sense_definition: A person whose job is to cut down trees.

examples.text: The <w>lumberjack</w> used a large chainsaw to fell the pine tree.
He decided to work as a <w>lumberjack</w> in the Canadian forest.

senses.sense_definition: A thick, warm jacket, typically with a plaid or check pattern.

examples.text: He put on his wool <w>lumberjack</w> to stay warm outside.
She bought a red and black <w>lumberjack</w> for the camping trip.

senses.sense_definition: To work as a lumberjack, cutting down trees.

examples.text: He spent the entire winter <w>lumberjacking</w> in the mountains.
They went <w>lumberjacking</w> to clear the land for the new road.
